TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509Store extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class X509Store Implements IDisposable
public ref class X509Store sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 X.509 存放區，這個存放區是保存和管理憑證的實體存放區。

span.span: Represents an X.509 store, which is a physical store where certificates are persisted and managed.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 X.509 存放區中使用這個類別。Use this class to work with an X.509 store. > [!IMPORTANT] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個型別會實作介面。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 目標的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]和更早的版本類別不會實作介面，並因此不需要`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 本節包含兩個範例。This section contains two examples. 第一個範例示範如何您可以在此處開啟每個標準 X.509 存放區和清單的憑證數目。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二個範例示範如何新增和移除單一憑證和憑證的範圍。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **範例 1****Example 1** 此範例會嘗試開啟目前電腦上每個標準位置中的每個標準的存放區。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它會列印是否每個存放區存在，如果數目因此，憑證就會包含顯示的摘要。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 此範例會建立標準名稱和標準位置的每個組合的物件。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它會呼叫方法使用旗標，這會開啟實體存放區，只有當已經存在。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果實體存放區存在，此範例會使用， ，和屬性存放區中顯示的憑證數目。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **範例 2****Example 2** 此範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用目前使用者存放區的個人憑證，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the personal certificates of the current user store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立物件目前的使用者使用個人的 X.509 憑證存放區。Use this constructor to create an object using the personal X.509 certificate store for the current user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個建構函式來提供與 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的相容性。Use this constructor to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 如需詳細資訊`HCERTSTORE`處理，請參閱 Platform SDK 章節中的 unmanaged 的 CAPI 文件[MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立物件，指定存放區位置，也就是目前使用者的位置，或是在本機電腦。Use this constructor to create an object, specifying the store location, which is either the location for the current user or the local computer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將一個以上的憑證加入 X.509 憑證存放區;如果某個憑證加入失敗，則會還原作業，並不加入任何憑證。This method adds more than one certificate to an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate addition fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are added. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. summary.span: 傳回位於 X.509 憑證存放區的憑證集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of certificates located in an X.509 certificate store.
A collection of certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法傳回的 X.509 憑證存放區的快照集。This method returns a snapshot of the X.509 certificate store. 請注意，後續或存放區上執行的作業不會影響傳回的集合。Note that subsequent or operations performed on the store will not have any effect on the collection that is returned. 此快照集都會重新計算的屬性稱為，每次，因此不建議使用這個屬性重複函式內。This snapshot is recalculated each time the property is called, so the use of this property inside an iterative function is not recommended. ## Examples 本節包含兩個範例。This section contains two examples. 第一個範例示範如何您可以在此處開啟每個標準 X.509 存放區和清單的憑證數目。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二個範例示範如何新增和移除單一憑證和憑證的範圍。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **範例 1****Example 1** 此範例會嘗試開啟目前電腦上每個標準位置中的每個標準的存放區。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它會列印是否每個存放區存在，如果數目因此，憑證就會包含顯示的摘要。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 此範例會建立標準名稱和標準位置的每個組合的物件。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它會呼叫方法使用旗標，這會開啟實體存放區，只有當已經存在。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果實體存放區存在，此範例會使用， ，和屬性存放區中顯示的憑證數目。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **範例 2****Example 2** 此範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

permission.span: 列舉中的 X.509 憑證的憑證存放區。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉 X.509 憑證存放區。

span.span: Closes an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會釋放存放區相關聯的所有資源。This method releases all resources associated with the store. 您一律應在使用後關閉 X.509 憑證存放區。You should always close an X.509 certificate store after use. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 會實作開頭的介面[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，類別未實作這個介面，因此`Dispose`方法不存在。 implements the interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the class does not implement this interface, and therefore the `Dispose` method does not exist.

summary.span: 取得 X.509 憑證存放區的位置。

span.span: Gets the location of the X.509 certificate store.
The location of the certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前使用者的存放區或本機電腦存放區，這個屬性會傳回的 X.509 憑證存放區位置。This property returns the X.509 certificate store location of either the store for the current user or the store for the local computer. ## Examples 本節包含兩個範例。This section contains two examples. 第一個範例示範如何您可以在此處開啟每個標準 X.509 存放區和清單的憑證數目。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二個範例示範如何新增和移除單一憑證和憑證的範圍。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **範例 1****Example 1** 此範例會嘗試開啟目前電腦上每個標準位置中的每個標準的存放區。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它會列印是否每個存放區存在，如果數目因此，憑證就會包含顯示的摘要。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 此範例會建立標準名稱和標準位置的每個組合的物件。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它會呼叫方法使用旗標，這會開啟實體存放區，只有當已經存在。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果實體存放區存在，此範例會使用， ，和屬性存放區中顯示的憑證數目。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **範例 2****Example 2** 此範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得 X.509 憑證存放區的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the X.509 certificate store.
The name of the certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性傳回的 X.509 憑證存放區名稱。This property returns the X.509 certificate store name. 這個值可表示憑證儲存，例如根憑證或憑證來自受信任的發行者的類型。This value can indicate the type of certificates stored, such as root certificates or certificates from trusted publishers. ## Examples 本節包含兩個範例。This section contains two examples. 第一個範例示範如何您可以在此處開啟每個標準 X.509 存放區和清單的憑證數目。The first example demonstrates how you can open standard X.509 stores and list the number of certificates in each. 第二個範例示範如何新增和移除單一憑證和憑證的範圍。The second example demonstrates how you can add and remove single certificates and ranges of certificates. **範例 1****Example 1** 此範例會嘗試開啟目前電腦上每個標準位置中的每個標準的存放區。This example tries to open each standard store in each standard location on the current computer. 它會列印是否每個存放區存在，如果數目因此，憑證就會包含顯示的摘要。It prints a summary that shows whether each store exists and, if so, the number of certificates it contains. 此範例會建立標準名稱和標準位置的每個組合的物件。The example creates an object for each combination of standard name and standard location. 它會呼叫方法使用旗標，這會開啟實體存放區，只有當已經存在。It calls the method with the flag, which opens the physical store only if it already exists. 如果實體存放區存在，此範例會使用， ，和屬性存放區中顯示的憑證數目。If the physical store exists, the example uses the , , and properties to display the number of certificates in the store. [!code-csharp[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/storenames1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[x509store2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/storenames1.vb#2)] **範例 2****Example 2** 此範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。This example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Open(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.OpenFlags flags) cil managed

param.name: flags
param.span: 列舉值的位元組合，指定開啟 X.509 憑證存放區的方式。

span.span: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that specifies the way to open the X.509 certificate store.

summary.span: 開啟 X.509 憑證存放區或建立新的存放區 (視 旗標設定而定)。

span.span: Opens an X.509 certificate store or creates a new store, depending on flag settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要開啟現有的 X.509 存放區中使用這個方法。Use this method to open an existing X.509 store. 請注意，您必須指定的其他權限，列舉存放區中的憑證。Note that you must have additional permissions, specified by , to enumerate the certificates in the store. 您可以建立新的存放區將不存在存放區名稱傳遞給類別建構函式中，然後使用任一加上旗標以外。You can create a new store by passing a store name that does not exist to the class constructor, and then using any of the flags except . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

The store contains invalid values.

span.span: Removes a certificate from an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來移除 X.509 存放區中的單一憑證。Use this method to remove a single certificate from an X.509 store. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

summary.span: 移除 X.509 憑證存放區中某個範圍的憑證。

span.span: Removes a range of certificates from an X.509 certificate store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 這個方法會移除 X.509 憑證存放區; 中的多個憑證如果某個憑證移除失敗，則會還原作業，並不移除任何憑證。This method removes more than one certificate from an X.509 certificate store; if one certificate removal fails, the operation is reverted and no certificates are removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。It assumes that you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store. [!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用為了提供相容性與 unmanaged Microsoft 密碼編譯 API (CAPI) 的屬性。Use the property to provide compatibility with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 如需詳細資訊`HCERTSTORE`處理，請參閱 Platform SDK 章節中的 unmanaged 的 CAPI 文件[MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about the `HCERTSTORE` handle, see the unmanaged CAPI documentation in the Platform SDK section of the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

for unmanaged code.
